column4: is there a way to get the printer to print a PDF from the last page I left off? there's, "all, current, range" as options, I've tried current, and not sure what I should input for range... I want to start where I left off.
I stopped printing at a page, say 86. I want to go from 87 and so forth.
I don't think that it is possible to do that. Never really looked into it all that much though.
